reviewText: When my wife suggested we try this tape, I had never even tried yoga. Years later, we still work out to Mark Blanchard's new DVD programs, and I think that he has an approach that unquestionably got me hooked on yoga. His style is less mystical and spiritual and more workout, dig deep material. This program is outstanding and it is clear how he evolved his progressive power yoga from this series. Rather than going to the gym now, my wife and I put his workouts on and we find the experience really bonding!
